<small>Aramaic form: [[H6032]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּן‎</span>] **verb** ==dwell== (probably; √ of following; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***support, help***, see especially [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>Kl. Schr. i. 87 ff.</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעָנָה֫‎</span> (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעָ֫נָה‎</span> ?) [[Isa.13.22|Isa 13:22]] ***and*** jackals ***shall dwell***, etc. (on agreement see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:145k»§ 145k</sup>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁכן‎</span> v[[Isa.13.21|Isa 13:21]]), so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]; [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Heb.Hpt.124</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָֽׁכְנוּ‎</span>; &gt; [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] and others √ IV. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענה‎</span>. — [[Ps.87.7|Ps 87:7]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְיָן‎</span>. 



 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָה‎</span> **verb** ==answer, respond== (Late Hebrew ***id., respond, make response***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲנָא‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Old Aramaic, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענה‎</span>; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***intend*** by saying); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Mic.6.5|Mic 6:5]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנַנִי‎</span> [[1Sam.28.15|1Sam 28:15]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָךְ‎</span> [[Isa.30.19|Isa 30:19]]; [[Jer.23.37|Jer 23:37]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָהוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.9.17|1Sam 9:17]] +; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנִיתִי‎</span> [[Hos.14.9|Hos 14:9]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲנֶה‎</span> [[Gen.41.16|Gen 41:16]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעַן‎</span> [[Amos.7.14|Amos 7:14]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲנֵנִי‎</span> [[Job.20.3|Job 20:3]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲנֵה‎</span> [[Mic.6.3|Mic 6:3]]; [[Prov.26.5|Prov 26:5]] etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲנוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.45.3|Gen 45:3]] + [[[2Sam.22.36|2Sam 22:36]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲנָוָה‎</span>]; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹנֶה‎</span> [[Judg.19.28|Judg 19:28]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***answer, respond to*** something said, actual or implied, [[Judg.8.8|Judg 8:8]]; [[1Sam.4.20|1Sam 4:20]]; [[Job.9.15|Job 9:15]] +; especially 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of men, with accusative of person [[Gen.45.3|Gen 45:3]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.5.29|Judg 5:29]]; [[2Kgs.18.36|2Kgs 18:36]] = [[Isa.36.21|Isa 36:21]]; [[Job.5.1|Job 5:1]] + very often (c. 110 t.); specifically ***be responsive***, i.e. ***answer kindly***, grant request [[1Kgs.12.7|1Kgs 12:7]] (suffix person); = ***be amenable, docile*** (toward <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Hos.2.17|Hos 2:17]] (of Israel in figure); seldom and late, with accusative of thing replied to, [[Job.32.12|Job 32:12]]; [[Job.33.13|Job 33:13]] ([[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]), [[Job.40.2|Job 40:2]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of God answering (graciously): usually with accusative of person; by oracle [[1Sam.14.37|1Sam 14:37]]; [[1Sam.28.6|1Sam 28:6]]; [[1Sam.28.15|1Sam 28:15]] +, figurative [[Hab.2.11|Hab 2:11]] by deed [[1Sam.7.9|1Sam 7:9]]; [[1Kgs.18.37|1Kgs 18:37]] (twice in verse), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאֵשׁ‎</span> v[[1Kgs.18.24|1Kgs 18:24]]; [[1Chr.21.26|1Chr 21:26]], and especially [[Hos.2.23|Hos 2:23]]; [[Hos.2.24|Hos 2:24]]; [[Hos.14.9|Hos 14:9]], see also [[Mic.3.4|Mic 3:4]]; [[Isa.41.17|Isa 41:17]]; [[Isa.49.8|Isa 49:8]]; [[Jer.33.3|Jer 33:3]]; [[Job.12.4|Job 12:4]] +, especially Psalms, e.g. [[Job.3.5|Job 3:5]]; [[Job.4.2|Job 4:2]]; [[Job.20.2|Job 20:2]] + 33 t., etc. (in all approximately 77 t.). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** rarely with accusative, or clause, of answer: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתשְֿׁלוֺם פַּרְעֹה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלהים יַע‎</span> [[Gen.41.16|Gen 41:16]]; [[Job.15.2|Job 15:2]]; [[Prov.18.23|Prov 18:23]]; [[Neh.8.6|Neh 8:6]] they ***responded, Amen !*** [[2Sam.19.43|2Sam 19:43]] ***they made reply against*** Israel (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***, only here), + quoted answer; with accusative of person + answer [[1Sam.20.28|1Sam 20:28]] ***Jonathan answered Saul, David asked leave***, etc.; with 2. accusative (c. 20 t.) [[2Kgs.18.36|2Kgs 18:36]] = [[Isa.36.21|Isa 36:21]]; [[Job.23.5|Job 23:5]] +; so = ***grant, vouchsafe to***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺרָאוֺת תַּעֲנֵנוּ‎</span> [[Ps.65.6|Ps 65:6]] ***terrible things dost thou*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***vouchsafe to us.*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** often + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָמַר‎</span> [[Gen.18.27|Gen 18:27]] Abraham ***answered and said***, [[Exod.4.1|Exod 4:1]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.19.8|Exod 19:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Job.4.1|Job 4:1]]; [[Job.6.1|Job 6:1]] etc.; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָמַר אֶלֿ‎</span> [[Gen.27.39|Gen 27:39]] + 16 t.; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> v[[Gen.27.37|Gen 27:37]] + 8 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> + accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אמר‎</span>, [[1Sam.9.8|1Sam 9:8]] ***he answered Saul and said***, + 23t. (in all approximately 130 t.); seldom + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵאמֹר‎</span> [[Num.32.31|Num 32:31]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> + accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עא‎</span> [[Gen.23.5|Gen 23:5]]; [[Gen.23.10|Gen 23:10]]; [[Gen.23.14|Gen 23:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Gen.41.16|Gen 41:16]]; [[Gen.42.22|Gen 42:22]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.1.16|Josh 1:16]] ([[BDB#D|D]]) . 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** seldom + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דִּבֶּר‎</span> [[Josh.22.21|Josh 22:21]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Kgs.1.10|2Kgs 1:10]]; [[2Kgs.1.11|2Kgs 1:11]]; [[2Kgs.1.12|2Kgs 1:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> + accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Gen.34.13|Gen 34:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2. a.** ***respond*** to an occasion, speak in view of circumstances : [[1Sam.9.17|1Sam 9:17]] (accusative of person + quotation), [[Judg.18.14|Judg 18:14]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָמַר‎</span>), [[Num.11.28|Num 11:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; + ***id.***), [[2Kgs.1.11|2Kgs 1:11]] (+ ***id.***), + 19 t. **b** figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲנֶה אֶתהַֿכֹּל‎</span> [[Eccl.10.19|Eccl 10:19]] money ***meets all demands***. 

**3. a.** specifically ***respond*** as a witness, ***testify***, so perhaps participle<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹנֶה‎</span> (absolute) [[Mal.2.12|Mal 2:12]] (in good sense); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person= ***in the case of*** = ***for*** [[Gen.30.33|Gen 30:33]] usually ***against***, [[1Sam.12.3|1Sam 12:3]]; [[2Sam.1.16|2Sam 1:16]]; [[Isa.3.9|Isa 3:9]]; [[Isa.59.12|Isa 59:12]]; [[Mic.6.3|Mic 6:3]]; [[Jer.14.7|Jer 14:7]]; [[Num.35.30|Num 35:30]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ruth.1.21|Ruth 1:21]] (&gt;[[BDB#Be|Be]] ***be occupied with***, II.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענה‎</span>; [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Lu|Luth]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]<sup>Kau</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִנָּה‎</span> ***humiliate***); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּפָנָיו‎</span> [[Hos.5.5|Hos 5:5]]; [[Hos.7.10|Hos 7:10]]; [[Job.16.8|Job 16:8]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפָנָיו‎</span> [[Deut.31.21|Deut 31:21]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעֵד‎</span> ***as witness***); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person + accusative of charge, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָרָה‎</span> [[Deut.19.16|Deut 19:16]], of false witness <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁקֶר‎</span> v[[Deut.19.18|Deut 19:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדשֶֿׁקֶר‎</span> [[Exod.20.16|Exod 20:16]] ([[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]] v[[Exod.20.13|Exod 20:13]]), \|\| [[Deut.5.17|Deut 5:17]]; [[Prov.25.18|Prov 25:18]]: absolute (bad implication) [[Exod.23.2|Exod 23:2]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***concerning***). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** less often ***make response*** as one accused (***respondent***) [[Job.9.14|Job 9:14]]; [[Job.9.15|Job 9:15]]. **Niph\`al 1**. ***make answer***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲנֵיתִי‎</span> [[Ezek.14.4|Ezek 14:4]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲנֶה‎</span> (**Qal** not in Ezekiel). 

**2.** be ***answered: Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵעָנֶה‎</span>, 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** [[Job.11.2|Job 11:2]] (subject words). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of man = ***receive answer*** [[Prov.21.3|Prov 21:3]], so 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵעָנֶה‎</span> [[Job.19.7|Job 19:7]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲנֶה בְּשִׂמְחַת לִבּוֺ‎</span> [[Eccl.5.19|Eccl 5:19]], wholly dubious; [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] (God) ***causes*** (all things) ***to respond in the joy of his heart***; [[BDB#De|De]] ***answers to the joy***, etc.; de Jong [[BDB#Wild|Wild]] ***occupies him*** (II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָה‎</span>) ***with the joy***, etc. 



 IV. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָה‎</span> **verb sing** (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sing, chant***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***singing, chanting***, etc.; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sing responsively***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hymn, refrain***; possibly Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***enû***</u></abbr>, ***resound (?)***; Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***anni***</u></abbr> is loan-word according to [[BDB#Bondi|Bondi]]<sup>80</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעָנוּ‎</span> consecutive [[Jer.51.14|Jer 51:14]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַנֶה‎</span> [[Jer.25.30|Jer 25:30]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּעַן‎</span> [[Exod.15.21|Exod 15:21]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּעֲנֶינָה‎</span> [[1Sam.18.7|1Sam 18:7]], etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֱנוּ‎</span> [[Num.21.17|Num 21:17]]; [[Ps.147.7|Ps 147:7]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲנוֺת‎</span> [[Exod.32.18|Exod 32:18]] (twice in verse); — ***sing, utter tunefully***, [[Exod.15.21|Exod 15:21]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***and Miriam sang to*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>) ***them***; of uttering shout (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵידָד‎</span>), as in vintage [[Jer.25.30|Jer 25:30]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> person), in attack [[Jer.51.14|Jer 51:14]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> person); (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲלוּשָׁה‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺל עֲנוֺת גְּבוּרָה‎</span> [[Exod.32.18|Exod 32:18]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#E|E]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing or person laudation [[Num.21.17|Num 21:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; well); [[Ps.147.7|Ps 147:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַמְּרוּ‎</span>), [[Ezra.3.11|Ezra 3:11]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָמַר‎</span> [[1Sam.18.7|1Sam 18:7]] ***the women sang, and said***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲנוּ בַמְּחֹלוֺת לֵאמֹר‎</span> [[1Sam.21.12|1Sam 21:12]]; [[1Sam.29.5|1Sam 29:5]] with accusative of thing laudation [[Ps.119.172|Ps 119:172]] (compare \|\| v[[Ps.119.171|Ps 119:171]]). — [[Isa.14.22|Isa 14:22]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עון‎</span> **Pi\`el** intensive: ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַנּוּלָֿהּ‎</span> [[Isa.27.2|Isa 27:2]] ***sing sweetly of it; Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺל עַנּוֺת‎</span> [[Exod.32.18|Exod 32:18]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***the sound of distinct singing***; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעַנּוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.88.1|Ps 88:1]].
